title: New Year’s Letter to Yamazaki
marks: Signature and Mark LLC, 2nd line from the end: {Yamamoto Baisō}
description: 21 lines; authoritatively written, looping and angular characters; second line from end (signature) begins after large indentation, approx. halfway down sheet; first and last line have larger characters
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Mr and Mrs George Haldeman
